ABTMSE

Transpose an array

Transpose an array

tomt(arr)

Arguments

arr
An array

Value

the transposition ofarr

Examples

tomt(array(1:120,c(4,5,6)))
#> , , 1
#> 
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4] [,5]
#> [1,]    1    5    9   13   17
#> [2,]   21   25   29   33   37
#> [3,]   41   45   49   53   57
#> [4,]   61   65   69   73   77
#> [5,]   81   85   89   93   97
#> [6,]  101  105  109  113  117
#> 
#> , , 2
#> 
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4] [,5]
#> [1,]    2    6   10   14   18
#> [2,]   22   26   30   34   38
#> [3,]   42   46   50   54   58
#> [4,]   62   66   70   74   78
#> [5,]   82   86   90   94   98
#> [6,]  102  106  110  114  118
#> 
#> , , 3
#> 
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4] [,5]
#> [1,]    3    7   11   15   19
#> [2,]   23   27   31   35   39
#> [3,]   43   47   51   55   59
#> [4,]   63   67   71   75   79
#> [5,]   83   87   91   95   99
#> [6,]  103  107  111  115  119
#> 
#> , , 4
#> 
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4] [,5]
#> [1,]    4    8   12   16   20
#> [2,]   24   28   32   36   40
#> [3,]   44   48   52   56   60
#> [4,]   64   68   72   76   80
#> [5,]   84   88   92   96  100
#> [6,]  104  108  112  116  120
#>
